page.title: 16A Day in the life of Cathy
page.content: At 7.45 I get up and have my breakfast ,get dressed, do some piano practise. Then I set off for school with my sister Mary. school starts at 9.00 with assembly, after which we do mathematics. At 10.30 we have break and I do the milk. At 10.45 we go in and have spelling test and sentence construction followed by recorder lesson. At 12.00 I have sandwiches for dinner.At 1.00 we have english, and then we play rounders until playtime. After play we have literature.At 3.15 I ring the bell for us to leave.After school I go to piano lessons with Mary and then we go home. We have tea and then I go and get ready for guides. At guides we do patrol activities,games and have notices. After taps we go home. When we arrive I have my supper, a drink, a bath and get into bed.I read until 9.15.
